Title: Relates to certificates of English language acquisition completion
Summary: Requires the commissioner of labor, in conjunction and in collaboration with the office for new Americans, to establish criteria for English language courses and programs which upon successful completion shall lead to the issuance of a basic or an advanced certificate of English language acquisition completion; requires such a certificate to be offered to any immigrant who successfully completes an approved course, program or level of such course or program as determined by the commissioner of labor.
LawCode: Add ยง45, Lab L; amd ยง94-b, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the executive law, in relation to certificates of English language acquisition completion for immigrants
